name: 5 Days at Dogie's
description:
Welcome to Dogie's, a simple, caring restaurant founded in the countryside that serves one thing only, and serves it well! As the new chef, you will be tasked with crafting our juicy burgers to order. Learn our menu and meet our high cowstomer satisfaction demands and you'll fit in just fine! Watch out for those tricky orders, the server tends to just write down what they hear, the supervisor is uncompromising, and the bull-headed manager is not someone you want to get on the bad side of! Work hard to keep the team together, give it 110%, and you'll make it through Five Days at Dogie's!

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/5-days-at-dogies
